titles.title: How Lovely On The Mountains Are The Feet Of Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How lovely on the mountains are the feet of him
That brings good news, good news,
Proclaiming peace, announcing news of happiness:
Our God reigns, our God reigns!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Our God reigns, our God reigns,
Our God reigns, our God reigns.
